snippet.textDisplay: NATO war analyst mistake: NATO believes Russia can be defeated and leaves Ukraine if they can destroy Russian weapons in Ukraine. Therefore NATO should do its best to support Ukraine with all necessary advanced weapons until Russia is defeated and impoverished into a Pariah state, as Biden said. On the contrary, from Putin's statement it is clear that if NATO continues to intervene in Ukraine, Russia will never hesitate to destroy NATO with nuclear weapons. Therefore, the more Russian combat equipment is destroyed, the closer Russia is to deploying its nuclear weapons, may be UK and Brussels first. A World Nuclear War (WNW) will only happen if Biden activates Article 5 and Biden will be responsible for it.
